name: channel_left
long_desc: My Slack API Getting started Slack apps Messages Integrations APIs Authentication Keep in touch Helpful resources Compatibility: RTM   The channel_left event is sent to all connections for a user when that user leaves a channel. Clients should respond to this message by closing the channel - this means that when a channel is left from client A, it will automatically be closed in client B. In addition to this message, all existing members of the channel will receive a channel_leave message event.
